title: bhaja bhaja mAnasa
sahitya:
bhaja bhaja mAnasa hari manavaratam bhakta parAyaNam ati shubha caritam


caraNam 1    shuka sanakAdi munIshvara vinutam jagati samasta carAcara vitatam
    caraNam 2    jahi dhanadAra sutAdishu rAgam svapna samEshu hi mama tAracitam 
    caraNam 3    pankajanAbha manantapurEsham pannaga parivrDhamAnca vilasitam
